extension.summary: Amazon Fire TV Cube custom scripts
extension.description: CoreELEC and bootup customizations, includes copying CE to eMMC, syncing BT remotes between FireOS/CE, changing boot order, and more.
extension.news:
v1.3 (2025-07-17) - Added new boot menu
v1.2 (2025-07-12) - eMMC install fix to prevent Cube update message when Cube already updated.
v1.1 (2025-07-11) - New option to install CommandCraft app to FireOS (fork of Reboot to CoreELEC with all rebooting options for the Cube) - Addon wording changes, minor CE update tweak
v1.0 (2025-07-08) - Initial release
